summary: Columbus is a major city in the United States, located in Ohio. It is the state capital and the 14th largest city in the country, with over 900,000 residents. The city was founded in 1812 and named after the explorer Christopher Columbus. It has a rich history, starting as Native American settlements and later becoming a European trading post. Columbus has a strong economy with diverse businesses, including research institutions and large companies like Cardinal Health and American Electric Power. The city has experienced significant growth and is now the largest in Ohio.
title: Columbus, Ohio
